registeration_info.nr_orgName: Starhung Tse Cultural and Welfare Society
registeration_info.nr_actName: Societies Registration Act VI of 1998 (1941 A.D)

source_info.purpose: The Monastery is situated in a farflung area of Ladakh region in Zanskar Sub-Division and lack of educated persons and internet communication in the valley we are unable to submit our genuine proposal to Govt. of India in time. However, we have socially activated to preserve the rich cultural heritage of Buddhism in the Zanskar through Teachings, Workshop etc.
